shortdesc.ph: Configuration options for custom audio tracks.
Configuration options for custom audio tracks.
Configuration options for custom audio tracks.
Configuration options for custom audio tracks.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable local audio playback:
: (default) Enable local audio playback.
: Disable local audio playback.

pd.note: This setting only takes effect for custom audio capture tracks of type AudioTrackDirect.
pd.ph: Whether to enable the audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enable audio processing module with echo cancellation (AEC), noise suppression (ANS), and automatic gain control (AGC).

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable local audio playback:
: (Default) Enable local audio playback.
: Disable local audio playback.

pd.note: This parameter only takes effect for custom audio capture tracks of type AudioTrackDirect.
pd.ph: Whether to enable the audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enable the audio processing module, which applies echo cancellation (AEC), noise suppression (ANS), and automatic gain control (AGC).

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable local audio playback:
: (Default) Enable local audio playback.
: Disable local audio playback.

pd.note: This setting only takes effect for custom audio capture tracks of type audioTrackDirect.
pd.ph: Whether to enable the audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enable the audio processing module, including echo cancellation (AEC), noise suppression (ANS), and automatic gain control (AGC).
: (Default) Do not enable the audio processing module.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable local audio playback:
: (Default) Enable local audio playback.
: Disable local audio playback.

pd.note: This parameter only takes effect for custom audio capture tracks of type AUDIO_TRACK_DIRECT.
pd.ph: Whether to enable the audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enable the audio processing module, including Echo Cancellation (AEC), Noise Suppression (ANS), and Automatic Gain Control (AGC).
